text: Oleg Petrovich Vernigorov (; born 5 May 1972 in Rostov-on-Don) is a former Russian football player. ==External links== * Category:1972 births Category:Sportspeople from Rostov-on-Don Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Rostov players Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC SKA Rostov-on- Don players Category:FC Tyumen players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Oleg Vernigorov
